issue_obverse_legend_s: FOUR HUNDNED DOLLARS | THIS Bill of FOUR HUNDRED DOLLARS shall be exchanged and redeemed in Spanish Milled Dollars, or the Value in Gold or Silver, at the Rate of One for Forty, at the Treasury of Virginia, on or before the 30th Day of December, One Thousand Seven Hundred and Ninety, according to an Act of Assembly passed the 16th Day of October, One Thousand Seven Hundred and Eighty. | VIRGINIA CURRENCY
issue_reverse_legend_s: FOUR HUNDRED DOLLARS. | ONE HUNDRED & TWENTY POUNDS.
